body_html:
@apaszke Yeah, If the #2764 is ready, performance of many operation such as exp and log will be promoted not only with openmp but also with simd. One reason why merging the pr must be very careful is that it involves with too many operation. But it is also very beneficial to these basic operation. If
the macro used in many OPs like tanh 'sigmoid' in THNN will also benefit from it.

The performance of our benchmark involved with Conv3d optimization gains 6.6X speedup on XEON 2699 V4 compared with official version. It will be very useful in HPC which has thousands of CPU.
